name: CHAIN OF PHRASES
description:
It will take few seconds to load. Play in full screen mode only!

Appropriate for all ages but focused on kids of age 8-14.

 Game developed by :- AQUAFY 

You can learn more about us and find this game on our official site : https://aquafy.tech/ 

"Poetry, with its beauty and many, many forms, gives us so much to learn" ~Grace Porterfield Polk

 Experience the joy of connecting words, phrases and sentences thoughtfully by giving it a taste of emotion that sounds amazingly well. All this in one game. Tell us in the comments your favorite genre of poem!
